greet a stranger

ask stranger a question
greet acquaintance

last interactee confront seen player
ticket taker confront player

actions.name: give ticket
leadsTo: Give ticket and smile but say nothing
Give ticket and smile and offer a compliment
Give ticket and do not smile

actions.name: receive mark
leadsTo: Receive mark and say thank you
Receive mark and ask what is showing today
Receive mark and ask if x is here today
Receive mark and ask if the theatre owner is here today
Receive mark and say nothing upon receiving mark

actions.name: greet a stranger
leadsTo: Greet stranger
Hello there, old friend! (male noble)
Hello there, old friend! (female noble)
Hello there, old friend! (servant)
Hello esteemed person I've never met before! (noble)
Hello esteemed person I've never met before! (servant)
Hello, I love this play, I've seen it four times! (female noble)
Hello, I love this play, I've seen it four times! (males)

actions.name: ask stranger a question
leadsTo: I know we've only just met, but can I ask you a question?
Have you been to this theatre before?
How many people do you think are backstage?
Are there a lot of nobles here? (servantVersion)
Are there a lot of nobles here? (maleNobleVersion)
Are there a lot of nobles here? (femaleNobleVersion)
Have you ever participated in a claque? (servantVersion)
Have you ever participated in a claque? (femaleNobleVersion)
Have you ever participated in a claque? (maleNobleVersion)
Do you understand what's going on in this play? (servantVersion)

actions.name: ask stranger for a favor
leadsTo: I know we've only just met, but can I ask you for a favor?
Can you help me get backstage? (esteemedServantVersion)
Can you help me get backstage? (unesteemedServantVersion)
Can you help me get backstage? (esteemedFemaleNobleVersion)
Can you help me get backstage? (unesteemedFemaleNobleVersion)
Can you help me get backstage? (esteemedMaleNobleVersion)
Can you help me get backstage? (unesteemedMaleNobleVersion)
You seem trustworthy. Could you please hold on to this package until I come back?
What do you say we whistle and stomp? (femaleNobleYesStomp)
What do you say we whistle and stomp? (femaleNobleNoStomp)

actions.name: bribe a stranger
leadsTo: I may have something for you...
If you help me out, I'll give you this juicy orange. (maleNobleVersion)
If you help me out, I'll give you this juicy orange. (femaleNobleVersion)
If you help me out, I'll give you this juicy orange. (servantVersion)
If you help me out, I'll give you 6 sous. (maleNobleVersion)
If you help me out, I'll give you 6 sous. (femaleNobleVersion)
If you help me out, I'll give you 6 sous. (servantVersion)
After I get what I need, I'll meet you outside with this gold Louis d'or (maleNobleVersion)
After I get what I need, I'll meet you outside with this gold Louis d'or (femaleNobleVersion)
After I get what I need, I'll meet you outside with this gold Louis d'or (servantVersion)
If you help me, I'll see to it that your fortune is assured for the rest of your life (maleNobleVersion)
If you help me, I'll see to it that your fortune is assured for the rest of your life (femaleNobleVersion)
If you help me, I'll see to it that your fortune is assured for the rest of your life (servantVersion)

actions.name: give stranger a command
leadsTo: I know we've only just met, but I have an urgent request for you.
When I go to the edge of the stage, start yelling to draw everyone's attention. (nonAllyVersion)
When I go to the edge of the stage, start yelling to draw everyone's attention. (maleNobleVersion)
When I go to the edge of the stage, start yelling to draw everyone's attention. (femaleNobleVersion)
When I go to the edge of the stage, start yelling to draw everyone's attention. (servantVersion)
Get those audience members away from the edge of the stage. (nonAllyVersion)
Get those audience members away from the edge of the stage. (maleNobleVersion)
Get those audience members away from the edge of the stage. (femaleNobleVersion)
Get those audience members away from the edge of the stage. (servantVersion)

actions.name: greet acquaintance
leadsTo: Be straightforward with your acquaintance
Hello old friend! (male noble)
Hello old friend! (female noble)
Hello old friend! (servant)
I recognize you from Versailles! (male noble)
I recognize you from the Salon of Mme. X! (female noble)
I recognize you from the gargote in my neighborhood! (servant)
I know you, keep your distance from me! (male noble)
I know you, keep your distance from me! (female noble)
I know you, keep your distance from me! (servant)

actions.name: lie to acquaintance
leadsTo: Try to trick your acquaintance
You remember the last time, right? Want to help me make some trouble again? (male noble)
You remember the last time, right? Want to help me make some trouble again? (female noble)
You remember the last time, right? Want to help me make some trouble again? (servant)
My word, it's been ages since I've seen you. (male)
My word, it's been ages since I've seen you. (female)

actions.name: ask acquaintance for a favor
leadsTo: Can I ask you for a favor?
Can you help me get backstage? (esteemed male noble)
Can you help me get backstage? (unesteemed male noble)
Can you help me get backstage? (esteemed female noble)
Can you help me get backstage? (unesteemed female noble)
Can you help me get backstage? (esteemed servant)
Can you help me get backstage? (unesteemed servant)
Tell anyone who asks that I have been sent backstage by the owner! (allied male noble)
Tell anyone who asks that I have been sent backstage by the owner! (unallied male noble)
Tell anyone who asks that I have been sent backstage by the owner! (allied and esteemed female noble)
Tell anyone who asks that I have been sent backstage by the owner! (unallied and unesteemed female noble)
Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (allied male noble)
Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (unallied male noble)
Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (allied female noble)
Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (unallied female noble)
Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (allied servant)
Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (unallied servant)
Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (allied and esteemed servant)

actions.name: ask acquaintance for a distraction
leadsTo: Can I ask you for help?
Would you yell and distract everyone with rude insults while I sneak backstage? (esteemed male noble)
Would you yell and distract everyone with rude insults while I sneak backstage? (unesteemed male noble)
Would you yell and distract everyone with rude insults while I sneak backstage? (female noble)
Would you yell and distract everyone with rude insults while I sneak backstage? (esteemed servant)
Would you yell and distract everyone with rude insults while I sneak backstage? (unesteemed servant)
Whistle and stomp with me after the next joke! (esteemed male noble)
Whistle and stomp with me after the next joke! (unesteemed male noble)
Whistle and stomp with me after the next joke! (female noble)
Whistle and stomp with me after the next joke! (esteemed servant)
Whistle and stomp with me after the next joke! (unesteemed servant)

actions.name: offer acquaintance a refreshment
leadsTo: Here, let me buy you an orange. Don't ask me any more questions. You know very well I can't answer them! (allied male noble)
Please, let me buy you a refreshment, and urge you to respect the pudeur of a noblewoman in need, and not oblige me to recount the humiliation... (allied female noble)

Here, let me buy you an orange. To be honest, it' my master's urgent business so I can't talk about it other than that it's, of course, an affair of the heart and that my very life depends on my getting backstage! (allied servant)

Here, let me buy you an orange. To be honest, it' my master's urgent business so I can't talk about it other than that it's, of course, an affair of the heart and that my very life depends on my getting backstage! (unallied servant)

actions.name: berate acquaintance
leadsTo: Do as I say at once!
You don't question me, you obey, rascal! Now do as I say! (male noble)
You don't question me, you obey, rascal! Now do as I say! (female noble)
You don't question me, you obey, rascal! Now do as I say! (servant)

actions.name: ask acquaintance for information
leadsTo: Can I ask you for information?
Do you know the owner of this theatre? (allied male noble to noble)
Do you know the owner of this theatre? (allied female noble to noble)
Do you know the owner of this theatre? (allied servant to noble)
Do you know the owner of this theatre? (unallied male noble to noble)
Do you know the owner of this theatre? (unallied female noble to noble)
Do you know the owner of this theatre? (unallied servant to noble)

actions.name: thank acquaintance
leadsTo: My hearty thanks, I won't forget your help! Now watch out, I'm headed backstage! (male noble)
Thank you, you've been such a great help. Now please, I must get backstage, it's urgent! (female noble)
Thank you, and please trust that in helping me, you are truly helping my master - your generosity will not be forgotten! (servant to noble)
I can't thank you enough - count on me for whatever you need, anytime! (servant to servant)

actions.name: last interactee confront unseen player
leadsTo: unseen male noble positive interaction
All I can say is that it's an urgent matter, and you must now help me leave - clear a passage for me!
There was something that I needed to verify, but it's not important. Can you help me leave without drawing any more attention?
Silence fool! Now I will take my leave.
unseen male noble negative interaction
How dare you ask me what I was doing - out of my way!
I'm sorry about before, but my business here is confidential. Will you help me get out of this crowd!
We don't really know each other, do we? I have nothing more to say to you.
unseen female noble positive interaction
I can't thank you enough for your help, and I'm afraid I must ask it of you again - I need to leave this theatre immediately!
I really can't disclose the nature of my query, but I implore you to trust me - please help me leave at once!
I don't wish to talk about this, ever; please don't mention my presence here to anyone.
unseen female noble negative interaction
You must help get these people away from me, so that I may leave unmolested!
I am so sorry if I offended you, although I hardly thought that possible.
Silence fool, and clear me a passage so that I may leave!
unseen servant positive interaction
Thank you friend! Now if you can help me get out of this theatre, I'll really owe you one!
My Master's work is almost completed, will you help me leave?
Shh! Don't speak, fool, just get me out of here!
unseen servant negative interaction
I'm the crook?! You're the crook - this one just attempted to rob me! Help!
Silence, fool, or I will have my master's men beat you!
Please, I am so sorry that we didn't get along before, but I really need your help leaving the theatre now!

actions.name: last interactee confront seen player
leadsTo: seen male noble positive interaction
I was seen? Then I really need your help getting out of here!
Shh! I can't say, but you'll be handsomely rewarded if you can help me escape this theatre. (noble interlocutor)
Shh! I can't say, but you'll be handsomely rewarded if you can help me escape this theatre. (non-noble interlocutor)
Silence fool! Now I will take my leave.
seen male noble negative interaction
How dare you address me in this way; normally I would challenge you on the field of honor, but you don't seem the type. (noble interlocutor)
How dare you address me in this way; normally I would challenge you on the field of honor, but you don't seem the type. (non-noble interlocutor)
You must help me leave; I will make it worth your while!
You will pay for this insolence - I must go now, but I shall not forget this!
seen female noble positive interaction
I am distraught by this indiscretion, and beg you to help me leave this theatre immediately!
I must leave now, and you must help me - clear a passage that I might leave unmolested!
I don't wish to talk about this, ever; please don't mention my presence here to anyone.
seen female noble negative interaction
Who dares address me in this way! Seize this fool, and have him thrown out on the street - or in jail!
What are you talking about?! This is a lie, a terrible lie!
Silence, and I will reward you handsomely - help me get out and I shall forever be in your debt!
seen servant positive interaction
Thank you friend! Now if you can help me get out of this theatre, I'll forever be in your debt!
My Master's work is almost completed, will you help me leave?
Shh! Don't speak, fool, just get me out of here!
seen servant negative interaction
I'm the criminal?! You're the criminal - this one just attempted to rob me! Help!
Silence, fool, or I will have my master's men beat you!
Please, I am so sorry that we didn't get along before, but I really need your help leaving the theatre now!

actions.name: ticket taker confront player
leadsTo: Farewell, my Lord, please return soon!
Don't trust that person, milord - here, exit this way!
No fighting in here! Please leave at once!
What's the meaning of this! Please leave at once, you're disturbing the spectacle!
Farewell, my Lady, please return soon!
Is everything well, milady? The exit is this way, if you wish to leave.
My Lady! This is shocking behavior! Please, for everyone's sake, leave at once!
My Lady, what is the meaning of this scandalous behavior? Please return what you have taken and leave at once!
A Lady alone at the spectacle, and who sneaks backstage during the show? You must not care much for your reputation!
Look what you've done! Give me back what you took, and leave - and never come back!!
You there, what's going on? Hand over what you have and get out of here before I call the police!
Good day, sir!
You there, what's going on? Were you just backstage? Get out of here before I call the poilice!
What is the meaning of this violence! Seize those men!
You there! Stop! What is this? Police! Police! Thief!
You there, what's going on? I don't know what you're up to, but you better leave before I have to call someone to throw you out!

actions.displayName: Give ticket and smile but say nothing

performance.text: The ticket taker smiles back.

actions.name: Give ticket and smile and offer a compliment
actions.displayName: Give ticket and smile and offer a compliment

actions.name: Give ticket and do not smile
actions.displayName: Give ticket and do not smile

performance.text: The ticket taker responds with a frown of her own.

actions.name: Receive mark and say thank you
actions.displayName: Receive mark and say thank you

performance.text: The ticket taker nods her head and gestures to enter the theatre.

actions.name: Receive mark and ask what is showing today
actions.displayName: Receive mark and ask what is showing today

performance.text: The ticket taker looks at you quizzicaly. "You purchased a ticket but did not know the show? How curious!"

actions.name: Receive mark and ask if x is here today
actions.displayName: Receive mark and ask if x is here today

performance.text: The ticket taker looks at you quizzically.

actions.name: Receive mark and ask if the theatre owner is here today
actions.displayName: Receive mark and ask if the theatre owner is here today

performance.text: The ticket taker looks at you quizzically.

actions.name: Receive mark and say nothing upon receiving mark
actions.displayName: Receive mark and say nothing upon receiving mark

performance.text: The ticket taker frowns at the rude gesture.

actions.name: Greet stranger
actions.displayName: Greet stranger

performance.text: Good evening!

actions.name: Hello there, old friend! (male noble)
actions.displayName: Hello there, old friend! (male noble)

performance.text: Hello there, my good sir. Excuse me, but do I know you?

actions.name: Hello there, old friend! (female noble)
actions.displayName: Hello there, old friend! (female noble)

performance.text: Hello there, my good lady. Excuse me, but do I know you?

actions.name: Hello there, old friend! (servant)
actions.displayName: Hello there, old friend! (servant)

performance.text: I'm not sure I have time to speak with you.

actions.name: Hello esteemed person I've never met before! (noble)
actions.displayName: Hello esteemed person I've never met before! (noble)

performance.text: Hello there, pleased to make your acquaintance.

actions.name: Hello esteemed person I've never met before! (servant)
actions.displayName: Hello esteemed person I've never met before! (servant)

performance.text: And you are?

actions.name: Hello, I love this play, I've seen it four times! (female noble)
actions.displayName: Hello, I love this play, I've seen it four times! (female noble)

performance.text: I'm not sure such behavior befits a lady of your standing.

actions.name: Hello, I love this play, I've seen it four times! (males)
actions.displayName: Hello, I love this play, I've seen it four times! (males)

performance.text: Yes, it is indeed a great one!

actions.name: I know we've only just met, but can I ask you a question?
actions.displayName: I know we've only just met, but can I ask you a question?

performance.text: Go on, what is it you would ask?

actions.name: Have you been to this theatre before?
actions.displayName: Have you been to this theatre before?

performance.text: Indeed I have, a number of times.

actions.name: How many people do you think are backstage?
actions.displayName: How many people do you think are backstage?

performance.text: Why, that's an odd question. How should I know?

actions.name: Are there a lot of nobles here? (servantVersion)
actions.displayName: Are there a lot of nobles here? (servantVersion)

performance.text: What do you care?

actions.name: Are there a lot of nobles here? (maleNobleVersion)
actions.displayName: Are there a lot of nobles here? (maleNobleVersion)

performance.text: Yes, a surprising number!

actions.name: I know you, keep your distance from me! (male noble)
actions.displayName: I know you, keep your distance from me! (male noble)

performance.text: You are quite rude my good sir!

actions.name: I know you, keep your distance from me! (female noble)
actions.displayName: I know you, keep your distance from me! (female noble)

performance.text: You are quite rude my dear lady!

actions.name: I know you, keep your distance from me! (servant)
actions.displayName: I know you, keep your distance from me! (servant)

performance.text: Why you impertinent scoundrel!

actions.name: Try to trick your acquaintance
actions.displayName: Try to trick your acquaintance

performance.text: Yes, what is it?

actions.name: You remember the last time, right? Want to help me make some trouble again? (male noble)
actions.displayName: You remember the last time, right? Want to help me make some trouble again? (male noble)

performance.text: Tell me more...

actions.name: You remember the last time, right? Want to help me make some trouble again? (female noble)
actions.displayName: You remember the last time, right? Want to help me make some trouble again? (female noble)

performance.text: Tell me more...

actions.name: You remember the last time, right? Want to help me make some trouble again? (servant)
actions.displayName: You remember the last time, right? Want to help me make some trouble again? (servant)

performance.text: Tell me more...

actions.name: My word, it's been ages since I've seen you. (male)
actions.displayName: My word, it's been ages since I've seen you. (male)

performance.text: I can't say I can recall the last time...

actions.name: My word, it's been ages since I've seen you. (female)
actions.displayName: My word, it's been ages since I've seen you. (female)

performance.text: I can't say I can recall the last time...

actions.name: Can I ask you for a favor?
actions.displayName: Can I ask you for a favor?

performance.text: Sure, what do you seek?

actions.name: Can you help me get backstage? (esteemed male noble)
actions.displayName: Can you help me get backstage? (esteemed male noble)

performance.text: Sure, but what do you want in the smelly backstage of this little theatre?

actions.name: Can you help me get backstage? (unesteemed male noble)
actions.displayName: Can you help me get backstage? (unesteemed male noble)

performance.text: I'm sure you're joking!

actions.name: Can you help me get backstage? (esteemed female noble)
actions.displayName: Can you help me get backstage? (esteemed female noble)

performance.text: Madame, I can't imagine what you would need backstage!

actions.name: Can you help me get backstage? (unesteemed female noble)
actions.displayName: Can you help me get backstage? (unesteemed female noble)

performance.text: Perhaps you're mistaking me for someone else, I would never help a lady in that way!

actions.name: Can you help me get backstage? (esteemed servant)
actions.displayName: Can you help me get backstage? (esteemed servant)

performance.text: I suppose I could, but what's back there anyway?

actions.name: Can you help me get backstage? (unesteemed servant)
actions.displayName: Can you help me get backstage? (unesteemed servant)

performance.text: Can't you just watch the show like everyone else?

actions.name: Tell anyone who asks that I have been sent backstage by the owner! (allied male noble)
actions.displayName: Tell anyone who asks that I have been sent backstage by the owner! (allied male noble)

performance.text: If you insist, but this is very shady.

actions.name: Tell anyone who asks that I have been sent backstage by the owner! (unallied male noble)
actions.displayName: Tell anyone who asks that I have been sent backstage by the owner! (unallied male noble)

performance.text: I'll do nothing of the sort, but I won't denounce you for whatever you're up to.

actions.name: Tell anyone who asks that I have been sent backstage by the owner! (allied and esteemed female noble)
actions.displayName: Tell anyone who asks that I have been sent backstage by the owner! (allied and esteemed female noble)

performance.text: Madame! I have no idea what's gotten into you!

actions.displayName: Tell anyone who asks that I have been sent backstage by the owner! (unallied and unesteemed female noble)

performance.text: Madame! I have no idea what's gotten into you!

actions.name: Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (allied female noble)
actions.displayName: Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (allied female noble)

performance.text: Certainly, let me help.

actions.name: Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (unallied female noble)
actions.displayName: Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (unallied female noble)

performance.text: I can help, but I can't imagine why you would want to get any closer!

actions.name: Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (unallied female noble)
actions.displayName: Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (unallied female noble)

performance.text: Here, let me help you.

actions.name: Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (allied male noble)
actions.displayName: Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (allied male noble)

performance.text: Follow me!

actions.name: Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (unallied male noble)
actions.displayName: Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (unallied male noble)

performance.text: Come now, I'm watching the show!

actions.displayName: Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (allied servant)

performance.text: Sure, let's see how close we can get!

actions.name: Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (unallied servant)
actions.displayName: Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (unallied servant)

performance.text: I'm really in no moode to push through this crowd right now.

actions.name: Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (allied and esteemed servant)
actions.displayName: Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (allied and esteemed servant)

performance.text: I can certainly help, but couldn't you get there just as well yourself?

actions.name: Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (allied and esteemed servant)
actions.displayName: Can you help me get close to the stage, I'd like to see better! (allied and esteemed servant)

performance.text: Do you know to whom you are speaking? Go away, and leave me in peace!

actions.name: Can I ask you for help?
actions.displayName: Can I ask you for help?

performance.text: Sure, what do you need?

actions.name: Would you yell and distract everyone with rude insults while I sneak backstage? (esteemed male noble)
actions.displayName: Would you yell and distract everyone with rude insults while I sneak backstage? (esteemed male noble)

performance.text: Sure, I'll help you!

actions.name: Would you yell and distract everyone with rude insults while I sneak backstage? (unesteemed male noble)
actions.displayName: Would you yell and distract everyone with rude insults while I sneak backstage? (unesteemed male noble)

performance.text: Are you drunk? Away, away from me!

actions.displayName: Would you yell and distract everyone with rude insults while I sneak backstage? (female noble)

performance.text: I will do nothing of the sort, and neither will you!

actions.name: Would you yell and distract everyone with rude insults while I sneak backstage? (esteemed servant)
actions.displayName: Would you yell and distract everyone with rude insults while I sneak backstage? (esteemed servant)

performance.text: Sure, I'll help you!

actions.displayName: Would you yell and distract everyone with rude insults while I sneak backstage? (unesteemed servant)

performance.text: Are you drunk? Away, away from me!

actions.name: Whistle and stomp with me after the next joke! (esteemed male noble)
actions.displayName: Whistle and stomp with me after the next joke! (esteemed male noble)

performance.text: Sure, I'll help you!

actions.name: Whistle and stomp with me after the next joke! (unesteemed male noble)
actions.displayName: Whistle and stomp with me after the next joke! (unesteemed male noble)

performance.text: No thanks, begging your pardon, I'm not looking for trouble.

actions.name: Whistle and stomp with me after the next joke! (female noble)
actions.displayName: Whistle and stomp with me after the next joke! (female noble)

performance.text: I will do nothing of the sort, and neither will you!

actions.name: Whistle and stomp with me after the next joke! (esteemed servant)
actions.displayName: Whistle and stomp with me after the next joke! (esteemed servant)

performance.text: Sure, I'll help you!

actions.name: Whistle and stomp with me after the next joke! (unesteemed servant)
actions.displayName: Whistle and stomp with me after the next joke! (unesteemed servant)

performance.text: No thanks, begging your pardon, I'm not looking for trouble.

actions.name: Here, let me buy you an orange. Don't ask me any more questions. You know very well I can't answer them! (allied male noble)
actions.displayName: Here, let me buy you an orange. Don't ask me any more questions. You know very well I can't answer them! (allied male noble)

performance.text: OK!

actions.name: Please, let me buy you a refreshment, and urge you to respect the pudeur of a noblewoman in need, and not oblige me to recount the humiliation... (allied female noble)
actions.displayName: Please, let me buy you a refreshment, and urge you to respect the pudeur of a noblewoman in need, and not oblige me to recount the humiliation... (allied female noble)

performance.text: OK!

actions.name: Here, let me buy you an orange. To be honest, it' my master's urgent business so I can't talk about it other than that it's, of course, an affair of the heart and that my very life depends on my getting backstage! (allied servant)
actions.displayName: Here, let me buy you an orange. To be honest, it' my master's urgent business so I can't talk about it other than that it's, of course, an affair of the heart and that my very life depends on my getting backstage! (allied servant)

performance.text: OK!

actions.name: Here, let me buy you an orange. To be honest, it' my master's urgent business so I can't talk about it other than that it's, of course, an affair of the heart and that my very life depends on my getting backstage! (unallied servant)
actions.displayName: Here, let me buy you an orange. To be honest, it' my master's urgent business so I can't talk about it other than that it's, of course, an affair of the heart and that my very life depends on my getting backstage! (unallied servant)

performance.text: Don't think you can buy me off with an orange.

actions.name: Do as I say at once!
actions.displayName: Do as I say at once!

performance.text: Excuse me?

actions.name: You don't question me, you obey, rascal! Now do as I say! (male noble)
actions.displayName: You don't question me, you obey, rascal! Now do as I say! (male noble)

performance.text: My goodness sir! You are quite rude, but I shall do as you command...

actions.name: You don't question me, you obey, rascal! Now do as I say! (female noble)
actions.displayName: You don't question me, you obey, rascal! Now do as I say! (female noble)

performance.text: Despite your rather rude insistence, madame, I am afraid I cannot do as you have requested!

actions.name: You don't question me, you obey, rascal! Now do as I say! (servant)
actions.displayName: You don't question me, you obey, rascal! Now do as I say! (servant)

performance.text: I most certainly will not! Begone, you knave!

actions.name: My hearty thanks, I won't forget your help! Now watch out, I'm headed backstage! (male noble)
actions.displayName: My hearty thanks, I won't forget your help! Now watch out, I'm headed backstage! (male noble)

performance.text: OK!

actions.name: Thank you, you've been such a great help. Now please, I must get backstage, it's urgent! (female noble)
actions.displayName: Thank you, you've been such a great help. Now please, I must get backstage, it's urgent! (female noble)

performance.text: OK!

actions.name: Thank you, and please trust that in helping me, you are truly helping my master - your generosity will not be forgotten! (servant to noble)
actions.displayName: Thank you, and please trust that in helping me, you are truly helping my master - your generosity will not be forgotten! (servant to noble)

performance.text: OK!

actions.name: I can't thank you enough - count on me for whatever you need, anytime! (servant to servant)
actions.displayName: I can't thank you enough - count on me for whatever you need, anytime! (servant to servant)

performance.text: OK!

actions.name: Can I ask you for information?
actions.displayName: Can I ask you for information?

performance.text: Sure, what do you seek?

actions.name: Do you know the owner of this theatre? (allied male noble to noble)
actions.displayName: Do you know the owner of this theatre? (allied male noble to noble)

performance.text: No, but I am sure that whoever it is, he could not be hard for gentleman such as yourself to find.

actions.name: Do you know the owner of this theatre? (allied female noble to noble)
actions.displayName: Do you know the owner of this theatre? (allied female noble to noble)

performance.text: I do not, but what could you possibly need with him?

actions.name: Do you know the owner of this theatre? (allied servant to noble)
actions.displayName: Do you know the owner of this theatre? (allied servant to noble)

performance.text: No, I don't have the privilege. Are you considering a career as a puppeteer?

actions.name: Do you know the owner of this theatre? (unallied male noble to noble)
actions.displayName: Do you know the owner of this theatre? (unallied male noble to noble)

performance.text: No, but I am unsurprised that you should be looking for such a person!

actions.name: Do you know the owner of this theatre? (unallied female noble to noble)
actions.displayName: Do you know the owner of this theatre? (unallied female noble to noble)

performance.text: I am rather shocked that you should have any interest in such a person!

actions.name: Do you know the owner of this theatre? (unallied servant to noble)
actions.displayName: Do you know the owner of this theatre? (unallied servant to noble)

performance.text: Please spare me your impertinent questions!

actions.name: unseen male noble positive interaction
actions.displayName: unseen male noble positive interaction

performance.text: Hello again! What was so interesting backstage, if I might inquire?

actions.name: All I can say is that it's an urgent matter, and you must now help me leave - clear a passage for me!
actions.displayName: All I can say is that it's an urgent matter, and you must now help me leave - clear a passage for me!

performance.text: Here, follow me - out of the way please, out of the way!

actions.name: There was something that I needed to verify, but it's not important. Can you help me leave without drawing any more attention?
actions.displayName: There was something that I needed to verify, but it's not important. Can you help me leave without drawing any more attention?

performance.text: Here, follow me - out of the way please, out of the way!

actions.name: Silence fool! Now I will take my leave.
actions.displayName: Silence fool! Now I will take my leave.

performance.text: Well! I suppose you can find the door just as easily as I can.

actions.name: unseen male noble negative interaction
actions.displayName: unseen male noble negative interaction

performance.text: You again! What were you up to back there anyway?

actions.name: How dare you ask me what I was doing - out of my way!
actions.displayName: How dare you ask me what I was doing - out of my way!

performance.text: Good riddance, you blowhard - take your distractions back to the Opera, and leave us to enjoy ourselves at the Fair!

actions.name: I'm sorry about before, but my business here is confidential. Will you help me get out of this crowd!
actions.displayName: I'm sorry about before, but my business here is confidential. Will you help me get out of this crowd!

performance.text: Well! I suppose you can find the door just as easily as I can.

actions.name: We don't really know each other, do we? I have nothing more to say to you.
actions.displayName: We don't really know each other, do we? I have nothing more to say to you.

performance.text: Good riddance, you blowhard - take your distractions back to the Opera, and leave us to enjoy ourselves at the Fair!

actions.name: unseen female noble positive interaction
actions.displayName: unseen female noble positive interaction

performance.text: Hello again my lady - whatever could you have been doing in that filthy backstage?

actions.name: I can't thank you enough for your help, and I'm afraid I must ask it of you again - I need to leave this theatre immediately!
actions.displayName: I can't thank you enough for your help, and I'm afraid I must ask it of you again - I need to leave this theatre immediately!

performance.text: Milady, I will escort you from this place at once!

actions.name: I really can't disclose the nature of my query, but I implore you to trust me - please help me leave at once!
actions.displayName: I really can't disclose the nature of my query, but I implore you to trust me - please help me leave at once!

performance.text: This all seems quite improper to me - I surely don't want to be involved!

actions.name: I don't wish to talk about this, ever; please don't mention my presence here to anyone.
actions.displayName: I don't wish to talk about this, ever; please don't mention my presence here to anyone.

performance.text: This all seems quite improper to me - I surely don't want to be involved!

actions.name: unseen female noble negative interaction
actions.displayName: unseen female noble negative interaction

performance.text: So she emerges after all - what an unladylike place to be!

actions.name: You must help get these people away from me, so that I may leave unmolested!
actions.displayName: You must help get these people away from me, so that I may leave unmolested!

performance.text: This all seems quite improper to me - I surely don't want to be involved!

actions.name: I am so sorry if I offended you, although I hardly thought that possible.
actions.displayName: I am so sorry if I offended you, although I hardly thought that possible.

performance.text: What effrontery! I should like to see you leave, but I shall never help you!

actions.name: Silence fool, and clear me a passage so that I may leave!
actions.displayName: Silence fool, and clear me a passage so that I may leave!

performance.text: What effrontery! I should like to see you leave, but I shall never help you!

actions.name: unseen servant positive interaction
actions.displayName: unseen servant positive interaction

performance.text: Well well, I didn't think I'd see you come back from there!

actions.name: Thank you friend! Now if you can help me get out of this theatre, I'll really owe you one!
actions.displayName: Thank you friend! Now if you can help me get out of this theatre, I'll really owe you one!

performance.text: Shh! Follow me.

actions.name: My Master's work is almost completed, will you help me leave?
actions.displayName: My Master's work is almost completed, will you help me leave?

performance.text: I don't know, this seems like it's getting risky! You go, and I'll follow later.

actions.name: Shh! Don't speak, fool, just get me out of here!
actions.displayName: Shh! Don't speak, fool, just get me out of here!

performance.text: Ha! Talk to me like that again and I promise you'll soon feel the back of my hand!

actions.name: unseen servant negative interaction
actions.displayName: unseen servant negative interaction

performance.text: There he is! Look! The crook who robbed the backstage!

actions.name: I'm the crook?! You're the crook - this one just attempted to rob me! Help!
actions.displayName: I'm the crook?! You're the crook - this one just attempted to rob me! Help!

performance.text: Stop! Thief! Stop that thief!

actions.name: Silence, fool, or I will have my master's men beat you!
actions.displayName: Silence, fool, or I will have my master's men beat you!

performance.text: Ha! Talk to me like that again and I promise you'll soon feel the back of my hand!

actions.name: Please, I am so sorry that we didn't get along before, but I really need your help leaving the theatre now!
actions.displayName: Please, I am so sorry that we didn't get along before, but I really need your help leaving the theatre now!

performance.text: Well maybe you should have thought of that before!

actions.name: seen male noble positive interaction
actions.displayName: seen male noble positive interaction

performance.text: Hello again! We all saw you sneaking about back there. What could you possibly be looking for?

actions.name: I was seen? Then I really need your help getting out of here!
actions.displayName: I was seen? Then I really need your help getting out of here!

performance.text: Well! I suppose you can find the door just as easily as I can.

actions.name: Shh! I can't say, but you'll be handsomely rewarded if you can help me escape this theatre. (noble interlocutor)
actions.displayName: Shh! I can't say, but you'll be handsomely rewarded if you can help me escape this theatre. (noble interlocutor)

performance.text: Well! I suppose you can find the door just as easily as I can.

actions.name: Shh! I can't say, but you'll be handsomely rewarded if you can help me escape this theatre. (non-noble interlocutor)
actions.displayName: Shh! I can't say, but you'll be handsomely rewarded if you can help me escape this theatre. (non-noble interlocutor)

performance.text: Here, follow me - out of the way please, out of the way!

actions.name: Silence fool! Now I will take my leave.
actions.displayName: Silence fool! Now I will take my leave.

performance.text: Good riddance, you blowhard - take your distractions back to the Opera, and leave us to enjoy ourselves at the Fair!

actions.name: seen male noble negative interaction
actions.displayName: seen male noble negative interaction

performance.text: There he is, the cretin who was walking around backstage!

actions.name: How dare you address me in this way; normally I would challenge you on the field of honor, but you don't seem the type. (noble interlocutor)
actions.displayName: How dare you address me in this way; normally I would challenge you on the field of honor, but you don't seem the type. (noble interlocutor)

performance.text: Do you impugn my honor? Shall we settle this with witnesses at dawn tomorrow sir?

actions.name: How dare you address me in this way; normally I would challenge you on the field of honor, but you don't seem the type. (non-noble interlocutor)
actions.displayName: How dare you address me in this way; normally I would challenge you on the field of honor, but you don't seem the type. (non-noble interlocutor)

performance.text: Ha, that's rich - after all, you're the one who's been sneaking around backstage at a marionette theatre!

actions.name: You must help me leave; I will make it worth your while!
actions.displayName: You must help me leave; I will make it worth your while!

performance.text: What effrontery! I should like to see you leave, but I shall never help you!

actions.name: You will pay for this insolence - I must go now, but I shall not forget this!
actions.displayName: You will pay for this insolence - I must go now, but I shall not forget this!

performance.text: Good riddance, you blowhard - take your distractions back to the Opera, and leave us to enjoy ourselves at the Fair!

actions.name: seen female noble positive interaction
actions.displayName: seen female noble positive interaction

performance.text: Hello again my lady - you made quite an impression on the audience this evening!

actions.name: I am distraught by this indiscretion, and beg you to help me leave this theatre immediately!
actions.displayName: I am distraught by this indiscretion, and beg you to help me leave this theatre immediately!

performance.text: This all seems quite improper to me - I surely don't want to be involved!

actions.name: I must leave now, and you must help me - clear a passage that I might leave unmolested!
actions.displayName: I must leave now, and you must help me - clear a passage that I might leave unmolested!

performance.text: What effrontery! I should like to see you leave, but I shall never help you!

actions.name: I don't wish to talk about this, ever; please don't mention my presence here to anyone.
actions.displayName: I don't wish to talk about this, ever; please don't mention my presence here to anyone.

performance.text: If you don't want people to talk about you, don't go sneaking about backstage at the Fair - but don't blame me!

actions.name: seen female noble negative interaction
actions.displayName: seen female noble negative interaction

performance.text: Stop, stop! This lady has disrupted the spectacle! She must refund all of our ticket prices! Refund! Refund!

actions.name: Who dares address me in this way! Seize this fool, and have him thrown out on the street - or in jail!
actions.displayName: Who dares address me in this way! Seize this fool, and have him thrown out on the street - or in jail!

performance.text: Ha, that's rich - after all, you're the one who's been sneaking around backstage at a marionette theatre!

actions.name: What are you talking about?! This is a lie, a terrible lie!
actions.displayName: What are you talking about?! This is a lie, a terrible lie!

performance.text: [The crowd chants] Refund! Refund!

actions.name: Silence, and I will reward you handsomely - help me get out and I shall forever be in your debt!
actions.displayName: Silence, and I will reward you handsomely - help me get out and I shall forever be in your debt!

performance.text: This all seems quite improper to me - I surely don't want to be involved!

actions.name: seen servant positive interaction
actions.displayName: seen servant positive interaction

performance.text: Do you know that we could all see you up there onstage? People are a little upset.

actions.name: Thank you friend! Now if you can help me get out of this theatre, I'll forever be in your debt!
actions.displayName: Thank you friend! Now if you can help me get out of this theatre, I'll forever be in your debt!

performance.text: What effrontery! I should like to see you leave, but I shall never help you!

performance.text: This all seems quite improper to me - I surely don't want to be involved!

actions.name: Shh! Don't speak, fool, just get me out of here!
actions.displayName: Shh! Don't speak, fool, just get me out of here!

performance.text: Ha! Talk to me like that again and I promise you'll soon feel the back of my hand!

actions.displayName: seen servant negative interaction

performance.text: Grab him and throw him out - this crook has been bothering the audience and interrupting the show. Get him out of here!

actions.name: I'm the criminal?! You're the criminal - this one just attempted to rob me! Help!
actions.displayName: I'm the criminal?! You're the criminal - this one just attempted to rob me! Help!

performance.text: Stop! Thief! Stop that thief!

actions.name: Silence, fool, or I will have my master's men beat you!
actions.displayName: Silence, fool, or I will have my master's men beat you!

performance.text: Ha! Talk to me like that again and I promise you'll soon feel the back of my hand!

actions.name: Please, I am so sorry that we didn't get along before, but I really need your help leaving the theatre now!
actions.displayName: Please, I am so sorry that we didn't get along before, but I really need your help leaving the theatre now!

performance.text: Well maybe you should have thought of that before!

actions.name: Farewell, my Lord, please return soon!
actions.displayName: Farewell, my Lord, please return soon!

actions.name: Don't trust that person, milord - here, exit this way!
actions.displayName: Don't trust that person, milord - here, exit this way!

actions.name: No fighting in here! Please leave at once!
actions.displayName: No fighting in here! Please leave at once!

actions.name: What's the meaning of this! Please leave at once, you're disturbing the spectacle!
actions.displayName: What's the meaning of this! Please leave at once, you're disturbing the spectacle!

performance.text: You leave the the theatre and continue with the rest of your day unmolested. Life is easier for male nobles in ancien régime France - congratulations on a lucky birth!

actions.name: Farewell, my Lady, please return soon!
actions.displayName: Farewell, my Lady, please return soon!

actions.name: Is everything well, milady? The exit is this way, if you wish to leave.
actions.displayName: Is everything well, milady? The exit is this way, if you wish to leave.

performance.text: You leave the theatre and continue with the rest of your day, having successfully leveraged your social status and navigated the minefield of traps laid for women of all status in ancien régime France - congratulations!

actions.name: My Lady! This is shocking behavior! Please, for everyone's sake, leave at once!
actions.displayName: My Lady! This is shocking behavior! Please, for everyone's sake, leave at once!

performance.text: You are allowed to leave, but the scandal of your behavior in public becomes fodder for public rumor for weeks, and you must leave Paris for the remainder of the social season. The restrictions on female comportment in ancien régime France are unforgiving, even for the nobility!

actions.name: My Lady, what is the meaning of this scandalous behavior? Please return what you have taken and leave at once!
actions.displayName: My Lady, what is the meaning of this scandalous behavior? Please return what you have taken and leave at once!

actions.name: A Lady alone at the spectacle, and who sneaks backstage during the show? You must not care much for your reputation!
actions.displayName: A Lady alone at the spectacle, and who sneaks backstage during the show? You must not care much for your reputation!

actions.name: Look what you've done! Give me back what you took, and leave - and never come back!!
actions.displayName: Look what you've done! Give me back what you took, and leave - and never come back!!

performance.text: You must return the plans you took, and leave the theatre to the sounds of heckling and laughter from the crowd. Despite your rank, you have committed sins against decorum that will not soon be absolved, and the ridicule of this moment will cling to your reputation for years to come. The restrictions on female comportment in ancien régime France are unforgiving, even for the nobility!

actions.name: You there, what's going on? Hand over what you have and get out of here before I call the police!
actions.displayName: You there, what's going on? Hand over what you have and get out of here before I call the police!

performance.text: You must return the plans you took, and slink out of the theatre somewhat ashamed. It's hard to get away with things when you don't have status or money! But along with that lack of power, you are less concerned about your reputation and the abstract ideas of honor. At least you got to go to the theatre (sort of) - if your master doesn't fire you for failing in your mission, you might even call it a good day!

actions.name: Good day, sir!
actions.displayName: Good day, sir!

performance.text: You exit the theatre and bring the plans to your master, who is very pleased and rewards you with a Louis d'or. Servants often draw their social status from that of their employers - and by the same token, can bring unwanted attention to a noble house by their bad conduct, especially if they are dressed in a recognizable uniform (livrée). But this was a good day!

actions.name: You there, what's going on? Were you just backstage? Get out of here before I call the poilice!
actions.displayName: You there, what's going on? Were you just backstage? Get out of here before I call the poilice!

performance.text: You slink out of the theatre somewhat ashamed, but you managed to keep the plans! While you lack social power, you ahve the advanateg of relative invisibility - servants attract little attention, although their clothing can cause trouble. In the uniform of a particular noble house - en livrée - servants may be given greater deference, but their conduct also reflects on the master. Today it worked in your favor - you will surely be rewarded!

actions.name: What is the meaning of this violence! Seize those men!
actions.displayName: What is the meaning of this violence! Seize those men!

performance.text: The ticket taker, wary of what looks like an impending fight, draws attention to you and your interlocutor; The crowd separates you, and the plans are stripped from your person before you are thrown out onto the street. If your master hears about this, you'll surely be fired, but at least you didn't end up in jail!

actions.name: You there! Stop! What is this? Police! Police! Thief!
actions.displayName: You there! Stop! What is this? Police! Police! Thief!

performance.text: You are followed out of the theatre by the ticket taker, and eventually two police archers come to ask questions and examine the item you took from backstage. You are brought to jail and your master is contacted; while he frees you, he also releases you from service. You must now either find a new service position in Paris, or return to your village in Poitou. Life in the city in the eighteenth century can be merciless for the poor, and there is less chance of starvation back home than unprotected in the big city.

actions.name: You there, what's going on? I don't know what you're up to, but you better leave before I have to call someone to throw you out!
actions.displayName: You there, what's going on? I don't know what you're up to, but you better leave before I have to call someone to throw you out!

performance.text: You are allowed to leave the theatre with the plans. What luck! Despite causing a scandal, you are considered of too little importance to really pursue, and run striaght to your master with the plans - which he immediately burns, before giving you a Louis d'or and firing you. You possess compromising information, and your master promises to have you severely beaten should you ever be seen in Paris again. Sometimes there's just nothing you can do - in many instances, nobles can abuse commoners (especially their servants) with impunity, and you are now effectively an outcast from the capital.
